page.title: 15School clubs/sport in Barton
page.content:
The St Mary's chess club meets each Monday lunchtime. We play matches against many of the schools in the Preston area and win some of them even though most of the schools have 4 or 5 times as many pupils.
The football, skittleball and rounders teams play in matches and rallies in both the Preston and Garstang areas.
In the last two years we have also competed in swimming galas, cricket matches and athletics meetings.
There are many certificates on the wall of the entrance hall for the events in which we have been successful. Even when we do not win we enjoy taking part.
